data.comment: Wesli De Cremer starts the match. Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off in Antwerp.
Goal! Joe Efford gives Waasland-Beveren a 0-1 lead in Antwerp.
In the minute 14, Great finish from Daan Heymans to give Waasland-Beveren a 0-2 lead.
Goal! Beerschot reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Tarik Tissoudali.
Wesli De Cremer blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Beerschot with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Mohamed Halaimia with Tom Pietermaat. This is the first substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
Marius Noubissi is booked for the home team.
In the minute 75, Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a second substitution, with Musashi Suzuki replacing Frederic Frans.
Loris Brogno is replacing Abdoulie Sanyang for the home team.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's first substitution at Olympisch Stadion with Jenthe Mertens replacing Andreas Wiegel.
In the minute 77, Din Sula is replacing Joe Efford for Waasland-Beveren at Olympisch Stadion.
Musashi Suzuki scores with his head for Beerschot to level the match at 2-2.
At Olympisch Stadion, Leonardo Bertone has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, Danel Sinani is replacing Matthias Verreth for Waasland-Beveren at Olympisch Stadion.
Wesli De Cremer blows to end the match. The final score is 3-2.
Loris Brogno scores with a header and the home team now lead 3-2.
Jur Schryvers (Waasland-Beveren) has received a first yellow card.
